      • testXPathwithAlienNodes

        public void testXPathwithAlienNodes()
                             throws Exception
        1) The first test document "XPathTest-foreignPrefix.odp" uses the prefix "daisy" instead of "office" for ODF XML elements. dummyOne!! It will be tested, if they have been renamed correctly. 3) The test doc also uses multiple different namespace prefixes with the similar URIs. Testing getPrefixes(String URI) from the NamespaceContext interface. Slide dummyTwo!! 4) Having element and attribute without namespace Somegood Content!!
        Throws:
        Exception

                                                                              throws Exception
        This test SHOULD fail, but it isn't. Its source code is identical to the first test in this unit test
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testXPathDuplicatePrefixForForeignNamespace

        public void testXPathDuplicatePrefixForForeignNamespace()
                                                 throws Exception
        This test checks if the XPath returned by OdfFileDom is correctly aware of namespacess. The NamespaceContext implementation in OdfFileDom is aware of duplicate prefixes, but getNamespaceURI(prefix) in OdfFileDom does not implement it correctly With the patch applied in OdfFileDom these tests pass correctly sample metadata rdf generate from Openoffice 3.3 looks like this : Xda+5VC/SQKKG7Bk83a2JA Conclusion false
        Throws:
        Exception
